item.description:
Introduction to the Enneagram
with Rosemary Shirley, M.Ed
Sunday, November 25, 10:30 - 2:30 $40
Registration required: Rshirley66@gmail.com
The Enneagram is an ancient system designed to assist one's personal
and spiritual development. Rosemary will describe each personality type and and how to use the wealth of information to improve lives and relationships. Learn What the Enneagram is, the nine points of view. habits of the mind and heart. The nine types will be portrayed in a video tour. Rosemary Shirley, M.Ed is a spiritual companion, Reiki Master and long time student of the Enneagram.

For a listing of all programs at A Higher Balance Healing Center go to http://www.ahigherbalance.com/
item.name: Introduction to the Enneagram
